name: Cozy Cold Night
description:
Controls: Arrow Keys to move, move into things to interact

The night is cold, but your heart is colder. You need something to warm you up.

You wake up in the middle of the night, wanting some heat. And the only way to do so in your cabin is to light the fireplace.

Search through the cabin and remember the past while you warm yourself, both physically and emotionally.

Includes 2 endings

Word Count: ≈3149 words (excluding code)

Uses the following Bitsy Hacks:

  • 📝 edit dialog from dialog: edit dialog from dialog (yes really)
  • 🖌 edit image from dialog: edit sprites, items, and tiles from dialog
  • 🏠 edit room from dialog: modify the content of a room from dialog
  • ☕ javascript dialog: execute arbitrary javascript from dialog
  • 🏃 smooth moves: ease the player's movement
  • 🏁 transparent sprites: makes all sprites have transparent backgrounds
